amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used to pay a bonus or other performance-based cash award to any employee of the Social Security Administration or the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services who holds a position to which such employee was appointed by the President, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, or a Senior Executive Service position.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (KY) amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 238 (Roll no. 672).
